summary.p: Converts a given value to an equivalent value.

examples.p: The following shows TO_BOOLEAN results for some input data:
examples.sampleCode: SELECT 'The TO_BOOLEAN result of value ''true'' is: ' AS Input, TO_BOOLEAN('true') AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_BOOLEAN result of value ''false'' is: ', TO_BOOLEAN('false') UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_BOOLEAN result of value 0 is: ', TO_BOOLEAN(0) UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_BOOLEAN result of value 1 is: ', TO_BOOLEAN(1) UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_BOOLEAN result of value -1 is: ', TO_BOOLEAN(-1) UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_BOOLEAN result of value 4711 is: ', TO_BOOLEAN(4711) UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_BOOLEAN result of value -4711 is: ', TO_BOOLEAN(-4711)
